Signals
The original $BUGS was designed for legacy financial institutions and has always lacked utility for retail investors. BUGS changes this by introducing onchain staking. Now anybody holding $BUGS can stake their tokens to earn passive income
Technical Analysis
BUGS is set up as a deflationary token with a buy and burn mechanism that sends 0.1% of every buy and sell to a burn address. 10% of the total supply is also allocated to be burned.
